Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Pneumatic starter motor overheat. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 26/07/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
